meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kathleen Mainhart Christian Maher Erika Rogers Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4440.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Kathleen Mainhart, an assistant professor of education from Brookfield, Connecticut
Christian Maher, a consultant from Erie, Pennsylvania
Erika Rogers, a bartender from Indianapolis, Indiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,000)

tr.td: COUNTRY
TURKEY
CHINA
CENTRAL AFRICAN REPUBLIC
CUBA
"ICE"LAND

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In October 2002 this late rocker\'s "30 #1 Hits" CD debuted at the top of the country charts')
